about.title: About Kissan Connect
about.text: Kissan Connect is a digital bridge empowering farmers and customers to connect directly. We enable transparent trade, affordable AgriServices, and a thriving marketplace for daily essentials.

faq.q1: How to register as a farmer?
faq.a1: Go to Login → Create Account → select Farmer, fill in details, and submit.
faq.a2: Login as Farmer → Agri Services → Rent Tractors → Contact Owner.
faq.a3: Open Products → Contact Seller button on the product card to view seller details.
faq.a4: Add items from Products. View and manage them in your Customer Dashboard cart.
